AvatarFilter::Waypoint

AvatarFilter::Waypoint Struct Reference

This structure stores a location in time and space for the filter output to move too or from. More...

Detailed Description

This structure stores a location in time and space for the filter output to move too or from.

Member Function Documentation

void AvatarFilter::Waypoint::changeCoordinateSystem ( SpaceID  spaceID,
EntityID  vehicleID 
)

This method changes the coordinate system of the waypoint by first transforming into common coordinates and then into the new coordinates.

spaceID_ and vehicleID_ are also set to that of the new coordinate system.
